root.name: playTone()
root.description: Plays a synthesized tone. The tone is specified by an integer note value between 0 and 127, corresponding to MIDI note values, and a duration and volume. Note that you do not need to create a new Sound object to use this method, you can call it directly on the class (see syntax).

parameter.label: duration
parameter.description: int: duration of tone, in milliseconds

parameter.label: volumn
parameter.description: int: volume of the tone, between 0 and 100
